Title: Whole genome transcriptome analysis of serotype M1 Group A Streptococcus (Streptococcus pyogenes) wild type and isogenic FabT mutants grown at 35C and 40C.
Description: The goal was to perform global transcriptome analysis on isogenic wild type 2221 and FabT deletion mutant M1 strains to investigate how inactivation of the fabT gene affects gene expression.
